item.title: Reasonable goals of v2
item.description: Due to the complex nature of GUI framework development, Fabulous v2 represents a substantial amount of work. In order to manage and optimize the time of everyone involved, more reasonable goals are required to get a version 2 out as fast as possible. Doing a complete redesign of the architecture + adding .NET 6 / MAUI support at the same time feels really discouraging. That’s why this version 2 will be done in 4 separate releases:

item.title: Virtualized collections
item.description: Virtualized collection enables displaying a scrolling list of data while only instantiating the visible rows. When scrolling, the no longer visible rows are reused and updated with the new data. In Xamarin.Forms, this is done via 2 controls: ListView and CollectionView. Also those controls support grouping data and displaying a group header/footer. My main idea was to let the user pass in its data source and declare a template function (as well as 2 others for header/footer).
